attributes.action: sack Gordon Brown from his post as Chancellor following his negligence in scrapping dividend tax relief on pension funds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown should take responsibility for the mess that he has created against advice from his own civil servants. His actions will result in millions of people being poorer than they needed to be, work longer than they should have had to and have a reduced life experience. Governments should be about improving the lot of their citizens not making them worse. Someone who has such poor judgement should be removed from office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
